inlineContent.text: Be the hero to change that by watching the video and providing notes! It‚Äôs super easy:

metadata.title: What‚Äôs new for the spatial web

abstract.text: Discover the latest spatial features for the web on visionOS 26. We‚Äôll cover how to display inline 3D models with the brand new HTML model element. And we‚Äôll share powerful features, including model lighting, interactions, and animations. Learn how to embed newly supported immersive media on your web site, such as 360-degree video and Apple Immersive Video. And get a sneak peek at adding a custom environment to your web pages.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

Discover how to easily compose, edit, and preview 3D content with Reality Composer Pro. Follow along as we explore this developer tool by setting up a new project, composing scenes, adding particle emitters and audio, and even previewing content on device.

Discover how to play immersive videos in visionOS apps. We‚Äôll cover various immersive rendering modes, review the frameworks that support them, and walk through how to render immersive video in your app. To get the most out of this video, we recommend first watching ‚ÄúExplore video experiences for visionOS‚Äù from WWDC25.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Support immersive video playback in visionOS apps

abstract.text: Dive into the Apple Projected Media Profile (APMP) and see how APMP enables 180¬∫/360¬∫ and Wide FoV projections in QuickTime and MP4 files using Video Extended Usage signaling. We‚Äôll provide guidance on using OS-provided frameworks and tools to convert, read/write, edit, and encode media containing APMP. And we‚Äôll review Apple Positional Audio Codec‚Äôs (APAC) capabilities for creating and delivering spatial audio content for the most immersive experiences.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Learn about the Apple Projected Media Profile

abstract.text: Discover the latest updates to Universal Scene Description (USD) on Apple platforms and learn how you can deliver great 3D content for your apps, games, and websites. Get to know USD for visionOS, explore MaterialX shaders and color management, and find out about some of the other improvements to the USD ecosystem.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: What‚Äôs new in Safari and WebKit

abstract.text: Learn how the latest web technologies in Safari and WebKit can help you create incredible experiences. We‚Äôll highlight different CSS features and how they work, including scroll driven animation, cross document view transitions, and anchor positioning. We‚Äôll also explore new media support across audio, video, images, and icons.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Create custom environments for your immersive apps in visionOS

abstract.text: Discover how to create visually rich and performant customized app environments for Apple Vision Pro. Learn design guidelines, get expert recommendations, and explore techniques you can use in any digital content creation tool to begin building your immersive environment.

Learn about the different ways you can create and present immersive video experiences within your app. We‚Äôll explore the diverse media types available in visionOS 26, including profiles for 180¬∞, 360¬∞, and wide FOV video; options for creating and playing Apple Immersive Video; and expanded capabilities for 2D, 3D, and spatial video. Discover which profiles are best for your app and its content.
